sentences.en: Gratitude is the least of virtues; ingratitude the worst of vices.
sentences.cn: 感恩是起码的美德; 忘恩负义是最不道德的行为.

sentences.en: He repaid me only with ingratitude.
sentences.cn: 他给我的报答只是忘恩负义.
他因忘恩负义而受到责备.

sentences.en: His friends were shocked by his ingratitude to his parents.
sentences.cn: 他对父母不孝,令他的朋友们大为吃惊.

sentences.en: I earn for thanks two samples of blind ingratitude, stupid to absurdity!
sentences.cn: 我得到的报答却是两种盲目的忘恩负义, 愚蠢得荒谬!

sentences.en: I have been repaid for the help I gave only with ingratitude.
sentences.cn: 对于我给予的帮助我得到的只是不义的报答.

sentences.en: I have been repaid only with ingratitude.
sentences.cn: 我得到的是不义的报答.
我从未见过这样的忘恩负义！
忘恩负义是可鄙的不道德行为.

sentences.en: It's her ingratitude that grates on me.
sentences.cn: 是她忘恩负义把我惹火了.

sentences.en: Next to ingratitude, the most painful thing to bear is gratitude.
sentences.cn: 除了知恩不报之外, 最痛苦并难以承受的一件事就是报恩.

sentences.en: Power takes as ingratitude the writhing of its victims.
sentences.cn: 权势认为因它而受害的人的折腾是忘恩负义.

sentences.en: Power takes as ingratitude the writhings of its victims.
sentences.cn: 权势认为牺牲者的痛苦是忘恩负义.

sentences.en: The person always returns ingratitude for kindness.
sentences.cn: 这个家伙常常恩将仇报.

sentences.en: The person of ingratitude has a sad exit at last.
sentences.cn: 那个忘恩负义的人最终的下场很可悲.

sentences.en: Your grandfather urged repeated forgiveness ingratitude , riot, and extravagance and all that.
sentences.cn: 你的外祖父总是一再说什么饶恕过多次了,忘恩负义,好惹事, 奢侈浪费等等闲话.

trans.tran_en: the quality of not being grateful
